description: Tanaka is a tiny little pervert coming from a long line of `Panty Masters`. Under his clothes, he has a very shapely feminine body that is mistaken for that of a girl`s from the back in an episode. He is constantly tricked into playing along with http://anidb.net/ch8267 [Maeno] and http://anidb.net/ch8268 [Izawa]`s schemes. He also constantly refers to girls he likes as `Mommy`.
name: Tanaka
